Row.Text: You find a cache of supplies that boost the [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production of your nearest city!
You find ancient relics that accelerate your civilization's progress towards a [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age!
You find a nomadic tribe that wishes to join your Civilization, granting you additional land around the nearest City!
Supplies for [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production in your nearest City.
A tribe that gives you land around your nearest City.
